sourcesContent:
import React from 'react' import { UilTemperature, UilTear, UilWind, UilSun, UilSunset, } from '@iconscout/react-unicons' import { FormatToLocalTime, IconUrlFromCode } from "../Services/WeatherService"; function TempAndDetail({ weather:{ details, icon, temp, temp_min, temp_max, sunrise, sunset, speed, humidity, feels_like, timezone, }, }) { return (

{details}

{`${temp.toFixed()}°`}

Real Fell : {`${feels_like.toFixed()}°`}
Humidity : {`${humidity.toFixed()}%`}
Wind : {`${speed.toFixed()} km/h`}

Rise:{" "} {FormatToLocalTime(sunrise, timezone, "hh:mm a")}

|

Set:{" "} {FormatToLocalTime(sunset, timezone, "hh:mm a")}

|

High:{" "} {`${temp_max.toFixed()}°`}

|

Low:{" "} {`${temp_min.toFixed()}°`}

); } export default TempAndDetail
